import React from 'react'; import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid'; import styles from '../../css/Work.module.css'; import design01 from '../../public/agoda-design/design01.png'; import dot from '../../public/dot.png'; import { Carousel } from '../Public/Carousel.js'; export const Design01 = () => { return(
Feature comparison to understand the industry standard At the beginning of the kick-off, we didn't receive well-defined requirements, and the back-end engineers were figuring out the data from the suppliers. Designers started from benchmarking to understand the fundamental functions of seat selection. Based on the feature comparison, I noted down the  various scenarios, features, flow, chance for optimization, and potential risks , as a starting point to explore how we could shape the product and define the scope of MVP.
) }
